1.title: The beginning

1213.content: What other ways does Miko get diapered.
1213.title: Other ideas

12132.content:
Miko was Finally home after a long day fighting glitchs. She got home and found a package in her room. ' dear Miko Kubota this here is a prototype game, we would like you to look over the game before we release it on to store shelves. Many thanks from A.B.D.L
"uh? ABDL I never heard of them before?" However Miko's interest is piqued. Miko set up her V.R set. As the game started up there was a warning "dear players this game has sexual themes, and nudie." Miko got more excited sense she loved sex games. As the game loaded Miko felt her clothes begin to change. When the game loaded she noticed that she was in a nursery fit for her size. Miko looked down and saw her normal unform was replaced by a purple onesie and a pink diaper. Miko then realized what ABDL stood for. Adult baby diaper lover, meaning she was going to be treated like a baby? Miko was confused about this game into she felt the need to go....
12132.title: Plays a ABDL game
